subject: Football
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Charley Casserly spent more than 30 years in football, coaching and scouting and eventually running two N.F.L. teams. But Casserly started as a teacher.
snippet: Charley Casserly spent more than 30 years in football, coaching and scouting and eventually running two N.F.L. teams. But Casserly started as a teacher.
